summary: A faithful recreation of the coolest sword in Runescape.
descriptionHtml:
*** From the mod RuneSky - Find us at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52520/? ***

This is one of my first models, made and textured from scratch. I'm trying to improve my abilities with 3d art, so feedback is greatly appreciated.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m694ixN.png?1[/IMG]

Can be crafted at any forge with no perks needed. For those who do not want to craft it, you can find it near the lumber mill in Riverwood.

Modelled by myself, with assistance from Servus Dei, TripleSixes, and elfmanthing. Find us all on Dark Creations.

http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/629-runesky/
author: CalledFireX
